mdException.name: net.geoprism.dhis2.response.DHIS2DuplicateAttributeException
mdException.label: DHIS2 Duplicate Attribute Exception
mdException.message: Attributes [{dhis2Attrs}] already exist in DHIS2 as a TrackedEntityAttribute. Delete your Geoprism dataset and reimport your spreadsheet with a different attribute name (or delete the attributes in DHIS2).

mdException.name: net.geoprism.dhis2.response.OAuthLoginRequiredException
mdException.label: OAuth Login Required Exception
mdException.message: You must log in via OAuth to use this feature. Log out, click the 'Log in with DHIS2' button in the top left, and try your operation again.
